title: Horizontal Compression
text: Try to identify the horizontal compression and what number the function is compressed by

title: Horizontal Compression's value
text: What number is being multiplied to $$x$$? It's $$3$$. Which means we have to compress reversely. What is the number we should horizontally compress by?

title: Vertical Stretch
text: Try to find what number is being multiplied to the function for a vertical stretch.

title: Vertical Stretch's Value
text: What number is being multiplied on the left side, and outside of f(3x)?

title: Vertical Shift
text: Now, perform the vertical shift upwards by $$1$$

title: Vertical Shift's Value
text: Add $$1$$ to the $$y$$ values only as the final step.
